citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm on
07-AUG-18.
The inspector was informed by a construction crew working on a building that the licensee was away from the
facility and would not be available today. No other authorized person was available for inspection.
